# Examples
Here you can check out some usage examples of LeagueAPI for command line.

## Usage & help
- [Pring generic usage help](https://github.com/dolejska-daniel/riot-api/blob/master/examples/LeagueAPICLI/Usage/help.sh)
- [Pring command-specific usage help](https://github.com/dolejska-daniel/riot-api/blob/master/examples/LeagueAPICLI/Usage/help_command.sh)

## Command lists
- [List all available namespaces and commands](https://github.com/dolejska-daniel/riot-api/blob/master/examples/LeagueAPICLI/Lists/list.sh)
- [List all available command from given namespace](https://github.com/dolejska-daniel/riot-api/blob/master/examples/LeagueAPICLI/Usage/list_by_namespace.sh)

## Commands
- [Fetch summoner information by name](https://github.com/dolejska-daniel/riot-api/blob/master/examples/LeagueAPICLI/Commands/getSummonerByName.sh)
- [Fetch summoner information by name (save to file)](https://github.com/dolejska-daniel/riot-api/blob/master/examples/LeagueAPICLI/Usage/getSummonerByName_output.sh)
